attributes.action: Award Nigel Farage a peerage for services to this country.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage has campaigned relentlessly to get the citizens of the UK a referendum to leave the EU. As the leader of UKIP who polled over   4m votes. Nigel Farage should be awarded a peerage for the great service he has done to this country and as representative of the 4m voices that he represents.
